channel.title: [DELTA] Repp ++ Client connection problem!
channel.description: Hey, can someone tell me how to make my client connect to the server yes my port is 43594 and both IP's are 127.0.0.1. If someone can just help me that would be great and don't forget your Rep!

item.title: [DELTA] Repp ++ Client connection problem!
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

Maybe it’s something to do with head icons (enabling/disabling) in your Player class? I think you have to set them to -1; Don’t ask me how exactly though.

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA] Repp ++ Client connection problem!
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

The problem is I’m trying to connect to a Delta with zDiddyReloaded Client… Sorry I forgot to provide that information…

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA] Repp ++ Client connection problem!
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

First of all you’ll need to provide us with a little more information. What happens when you try to connect? Did you compile? Did the client and server come as a package because if not then you’re bound to run into problems.

The client might be the wrong revision for the server, or an item that is too high for that cache revision may be restricting you from logging in.

Read full topic
